name: Treble Death
description:
A rhythmic 2d side-scrolling action game where you play as Treble, a demon girl beating up skeletons for rattling their bones too loud.

CONTROLS

Hold left or right arrow key to buffer a direction. Tapping also changes direction.

Z - Move

X - Attack

C - Enter Stance, doubling range of next attack

Moving, attacking and stances are reliant on beats.

( Please download the game for higher quality experience!! )

You can press Esc to change the resolution of the game in the downloadable version.
